attributes.action: Government funded Army Of Darkness sequel.
attributes.additional_details:
Bruce Campbells seminal work "Army of Darkness" was released to the general public in 1993. Twenty one years have now passed since this masterpiece garnered critical success and won over the heart and minds of the nation. With no word from Hollywood of funding on a sequel, I suggest the British government steps in and funds this dream sequel.
Please note this must be a sequel and not a remake.
